group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:  "Of course, if she goes away,]@[textBlack:  I'll be going with her,]@[textBlack:  but I wanna enjoy school life]@[textBlack:  with her a little bit more."]
[textBlack:  "And someday, when I grow up,]@[textBlack:  I wanna be Yuna's right-hand woman,]@[textBlack:  who can support her even outside]@[textBlack:  of being a Magical Girl."]

[textBlack:  "I'm way more skilled in]@[textBlack:  communication now, so I'd like it]@[textBlack:  if I could just make friends and]@[textBlack:  round up a buncha members so]@[textBlack:  we can all play games together."]
[textBlack:  "I think it'd be awesome if I could]@[textBlack:  make a pro-gaming team."]

[textBlack:  "And I mean, I've been allowed to@  do whatever I want, so I don't have@  any major regrets about my life.@  But after spendin' time with Sis,@  Lil' Sis, and the Horse,@  I've started seein' the world@  a little differently."]
[textBlack:  "Funny enough, I've learned@  how much fun it is to hang out@  with my friends."]
[textBlack:  "That's why I'm gonna save Lil' Sis@  and peace outta this world before@  any regrets can start pilin' up.@  It'd be too hard for me otherwise."]
[textBlack:  "Alas, I have been drenched in]@[textBlack:  blood since the moment I]@[textBlack:  became a Magical Girl.]@[textBlack:  Never have I known a moment]@[textBlack:  of solace..."]
[textBlack:  "If severing veins is all I know,]@[textBlack:  I don't think I am fit for a]@[textBlack:  peaceful future."]

[textBlack:  "As such, in spite of my wishes...]@[textBlack:  I believe I should hand the city's]@[textBlack:  future down to Hikaru and Ao,]@[textBlack:  and then die so that I don't@  ruin this world..."]
